Eliances HEROES Show Money Radio, iHeart

The Eliances Heroes show is getting noticed, and gaining enormous popularity--voted Best Weekday Show. Video and 360 too! We interview Heroes in business, entertainment, sports, and more; we unmask our hero guests and ask unique, thought-provoking questions to understand their journey and how listeners can learn from them their vast expertise.Listen to us Mondays at noon (MST) on Money Radio, AM1510, FM105.3. Now Saturdays at 9am (MST) too!live streaming: http://streamdb4web.securenetsystems.net/v5/KFNNpast recordings: http://www.eliances.com/public/Radio-Interviews.cfmhttps://www.iheart.com/podcast/263-eliances-heroes-27778707/episodes/Featured Heroes interviewed by David Cogan:• President of the United Nations• Senator John McCain• James Carville• Scottsdale Mayor Jim Lane• AZ State Treasurer• AZ Secretary of State• Attorney General of AZ• Van Jones• Newt Gingrich• Patrick Kennedy• The North Face (founder)• Match .com (cofounder)• IKEA (President)• Telemundo (President)• Brewer Samuel Adams Beer (CEO)• 1-800-Got-Junk (CEO)• YUM Brands Chairman (KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell)• Edible Arrangements (CEO)• Dippin' Dots (Inventor/founder)• Apple iPhone's Siri• Lou Malnati's Pizza (President)• Apple (CEO)• Kevin Harrington (original Shark)• Sir Richard Branson• Sandler Training (CEO)• Mobile Mini (CEO inc 500)• Caliber Co (CEO Inc 500)• ACT! Software (Founder)• Scorpion Computer Services (CEO)• Crowd Optic (CEO)• Elite Daily (Founder)• Authorize .net (founder)• Entrepreneur Magazine (Chief Editor)• GPS Insight (CEO Inc 5000)• Been Verified (founder)• Leigh Steinberg • Pepsi Co. (CEO)• Angie's List (founder)• Wells Fargo (President)• Chase Bank (VP)• Musicians (HoF Talking Heads, OK Go, Thomas Dolby)• NFL Hall of Famers• Guinness World Records Holders• Master of Illusion• Reality TV stars (Storage Wars, Housewives BH, Hard Core Pawn)• Actors (Highlander, House of Cards, Django Unchained)• Tony Horton (creator of P90x)

I'm known as Glue! As the Communications Chairperson I work with other leaders in Eliances to drive the company focus and success. I write, edit, or review roughly 95% of the communications from Eliances.com. I plan, execute and oversee the marketing effort with a dedicated team of members who also are building the community. I produce the "Eliances Heroes" Money Radio show, web content, news releases, and social media to email campaigns, newsletters, and more.Working very closely with the founder, David Cogan, we continuously strive to enhance the value of membership, ensuring we're making an impact in the Valley of the Sun and around the world. We're raising the whisper to a shout, and always working on what's next for Eliances.

LUPI Docs & Designs performs editing for fiction or non-fiction books. Most recently I edited a 220-page young adult fiction book, and a 70-page book on creating business plans.  I also worked on a Crowdfunding Reg A+ offering document. In the past, I worked on everything from newspapers, magazines, and trade journals, to proposals, procedures, user guides, and training manuals. I also created marketing collateral, press releases, newsletters, email campaigns, web site content, resumes, job descriptions, and blog articles. I regularly collaborate with other marketing providers, web site developers, photographers, and graphic artists.Throughout my career, I have worked in various industries—my technical writing background allows me to pick up new concepts quickly. If you have a project, let's talk about how I can help get it published, in print or online.
Technical Writer, Strategic Marketing, Global Services and Engineering

Shared writing/editing resource between Marketing, Service and Engineering departments for all forms of documentation including web content, user manuals, quick guides, service knowledge base, and marketing tools for digital laser material processing solution manufacturer.

Completed my college career at this Rochester campus by writing a self-directed senior thesis on the works of C.S. Lewis (Space Trilogy, The Great Divorce, The Four Loves, etc.), and studying journalistic writing & editing, business writing, poetry writing, the Bible as literature, and photography among other last minute courses to finish my degree. The majority of degree courses in English were completed at Southern Illinois University at Carbondale, in addition to writing and editing for the college newspaper, the Daily Egyptian.

I helped fundraise close to $90,000 for the American Stroke Association as a participant and mentor in Train to End Stroke, a marathon training program. The Halle Heart Children’s Museum in Tempe, Arizona educates, engages and empowers nearly 30,000 children each year through an interactive and state-of-the-art experience focused on heart healthy lifestyle choices, heart function and emergency response. I was recruited to serve as a table captain for an educational fundraising breakfast event and helped raise more than $10,000 for the museum.

August 29, 2015, Tracy was a client of Christine’s

Christine is a talented, upbeat, and VERY accommodating writer. I hired her to develop a campaign that required creativity and the ability to succinctly make a business case and drive action. She delivered on a tight time frame and with minimal direction. Working with her was a pleasure because she is highly collaborative and proactive, plus more service-driven and committed than I have seen from a writer in a long time. I highly recommend bringing in Christine when you need someone to jump in and take ownership of a project, produce quality results, and work quickly--all with a contagious sense of humor as a bonus!

summary: They call me Glue & I speak Geek! I'm an editor. Let's talk about your book project today, I can coach you through writing, edit it, and prep it for publication. If you have a different project you need help with, let's chat about it, I'm happy refer you to a great resource as well. www.lupidocs.com Check Projects under Lupi Docs & Designs to see some past projects.CREDITSEditing - Out now!
